references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational concept of Neural Ordinary Differential Equations (NODE), which is the core methodology of the presented work.

references.paper_title: Automatic exposure correction of consumer photographs
references.reason: This paper introduces the initial concept of automated curve-adjustment methods for image enhancement, which directly inspires the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Zero-reference deep curve estimation for low-light image enhancement
references.reason: This paper proposes a state-of-the-art unsupervised low-light enhancement method based on curve adjustment, which is directly compared against in this paper.

references.paper_title: Learning to enhance low-light image via zero-reference deep curve estimation
references.reason: This paper further advances the curve-adjustment-based approach for low-light enhancement, offering a direct comparison for the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Rellie: Deep reinforcement learning for customized low-light image enhancement
references.reason: This paper explores reinforcement learning for curve parameter prediction in low-light enhancement, providing another relevant comparison for the proposed method.
